attributes.action: Proclaim St George's Day a national holiday in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need another bank holiday, why not give the people of England their National day(St George's day)as a national holiday.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Proclaim St George's Day a national holiday in England."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11651.asp

Prime Minister's Office
